phrases: Sorry to change the subject, but...
By the way, do you all have plans for winter vacation?
Since the Phoenix Festa was such a learning experience for me,
I thought I would take this opportunity to re-train myself.
I am just going to go through my usual regimen, I guess.
Since we are finally getting some time off, I thought I would take it easy.
Really?
A quiet New Year's holiday...
That sounds pretty good.
So sleep through New Year's with me, Aya
Actually, there is something I would like to discuss with you.
Discuss?
Hello, everybody!
I have come to pick you up!
KINGDOM OF LIESELTANIA, CAPITAL: STOREL
Amagiri!
Ayato!
How did we end up like this?
Lieseltania
Brother!
What exactly were you thinking?
Oh, my, Julis and Claudia!
It is been so long!
It is been a while, yes.
Excuse me, Maria.
I would like a word with my brother if you do not mind.
Very well!
I know you helped Flora during the Phoenix Festa.
I invited you all here so that I could thank you for that.
And I am happy you have accepted my invitation.
I am Julis's older brother, Jolbert.
I guess you could say that I am the king of this country.
And this is my wife, Maria.
It is very nice to meet you.
N-Nice to meet you.
Y-Yes!
King?
Never mind that, Brother!
No one ever told me anything about a victory parade!
Well, if I told you, you would have hated it.
Of course I would have!
Putting me through it is one thing,
but what were you thinking, dragging Ayato into it, as well?
Have not you ever heard of consulting people in advance?
All right, all right.
I apologize.
Sorry about that, everyone.
But Julis...
the people are intrigued, not just by you,
but by your tag partner, Amagiri, as well.
After all, he is the partner their princess hand-picked herself.
Well, well!
Is it only the citizens who are intrigued by him?
My, my, you are as perceptive as always, are not you, my dear Ms. Enfield?
What are you talking about?
Do you think we could discuss that another time?
I have so many other things I want to talk to you and Amagiri about.
Well, I suppose I do not mind.
Oh, sure.
Yes, of course!
Oh, and...
so I hope you will all attend.
Wow, it is so beautiful!
Yup!
In the springtime, there are flowers everywhere, so it is even prettier!
I had you come because I wanted you to see my country.
I am sorry it turned into such a big deal.
This is really something.
These buildings are so imposing.
Well, this garden and villa were built during the time of the Holy Roman Empire.
Later, it gained its independence as the Kingdom of Lieseltania,
only to be wiped out in the German revolution.
Oh, really?
But then after the Invertia,
an extremely rare Grade A Beltis meteorite of the highest caliber
was discovered in one of Lieseltania's former territories.
And the Integrated Enterprise Foundation began fighting over it.
But a serious military confrontation would have been too risky for them.
So they signed an agreement to distribute the profits.
And then they thought they might as well create a playground for themselves,
and resurrected the country that existed there before...
Lieseltania.
In other words, a puppet state?
To put it bluntly, yes.
That is why my country is under their tight control in every way.
Yes, we do receive some financial benefits, but as for the rest...
So many people are suffering from the disparity.
I want to change this country.
I am very sorry,
but I cannot concede no matter what.
Yes...
Of course, I am entirely aware.
Goodbye.
Yes?
Come in.
Um, Mr. Amagiri...
What is wrong, Flora?
Um, it is almost time for dinner,
but Lady Sasamiya is not in her room.
Saya's directionally-challenged, so she might be lost.
All right!
I think I have a good idea where she might be,
so I will help you look for her.
Saya, I hear that dinner's ready!
Ayato...
Saya?
Ayato...
I have always...
always wanted to tell you I am sorry.
Sorry... for what, exactly?
After I moved away, you and I kept in touch.
Remember?
Sure.
But then it got too painful for me, and I was the one who stopped.
Huh?
Is that what happened?
Because...
Before, we used to play together everyday,
but after I moved, I could only talk to you.
And only for a really short time.
At first, that was what I looked forward to,
but before I knew it, it had become painful.
So I decided... until the day came we could properly meet again...
But that is not really such a big deal.
That is not all.
If we would kept in touch the whole time, then when Big Sis Haru went missing,
I might have been able to help you, Ayato.
Even if I could not help, I could have cheered you up.
I could have supported you, even.
And that... that is what makes me so frustrated.
Saya...
That is what I should have done.
Because I...
I would always been by your side, Ayato.
That is why, Ayato...
I want you to lean on me when you need to.
This time for sure, I am going to be there for you.
Saya...
What I am supposed to do right now...
Julis, it is to be there for you.
Thanks,
Saya.
If that day ever comes, I am counting on you.
Right.
Come on, let us go.
Everyone is hungry and waiting for you.
Okay.
Now, I would like to take this opportunity to consult you all.
It is about next year's Festa.
I would like all of you present to take part in the Gryps Festa as my teammates.
I did invite Ayato before.
His answer then was...
If Julis joins.
Do you still feel the same way?
Right, nothing's changed.
Julis.
How about you?
Before I answer, there is something I want to ask you.
Yes, what would that be?
Why are you so obsessed with the Gryps Festa?
You could easily advance in the Phoenix Festa or the Lindwurs Festa.
True, I would be sure to advance,
but it would be difficult for me to win it all.
And that would be unacceptable.
You have a chance in the Gryps Festa?
Yes, as long as I have dependable teammates, that is.
I will go further into detail after you have agreed to become my teammates.
Since it has to do with my weakness, as well as this one's.
Precognition has a weakness?
No weapon is infallible.
But you are powerful even without the Pan-Dora, are not you?
Oh, no, my powers without the Pan-Dora are quite pedestrian.
That is precisely why I need powerful comrades.
Remember, anyone who hopes to win the Gryps Festa
will need to defeat those Lifelordes.
The team of Zhao Hufeng and Cecily Wong, former Phoenix Festa runners-up,
will surely compete for Jie Long.
Plus, I hear that Divine Revelations' 1 disciple, too, will be on this team.
Right, you mean Hagun Seikun, their Rank 2?
So I hear it is very terrifying.
We also cannot underestimate Rusalka of Queenvail.
And there are sure to be other formidable teams in our path.
True, it probably will not be easy to win the next Gryps Festa.
I agree.
Even so, I do believe that with you on my team, we have a chance.
Understood.
I will take part as a member of your team.
No reason to decline, anyway.
That really looks good on you, Mr. Amagiri!
You think so?
I have never dressed this way before, so it makes me nervous.
Excuse me, Mr. Amagiri.
You are not allowed to carry weapons during parties,
so I will hold onto that for you.
I see.
Fine by me.
Julis?
I am coming in.
R-Right.
Come on in.
Wh-What are you standing there in a daze for?
She is right, Ayato.
At times like these, you are expected to pay compliments to the ladies.
Agreed.
Oh, no, I... uh...
I am sure I do not look good in this... so you do not have to!
Oh, uh...
I think you all look great!
Thank you very much.
That becomes you quite well, too.
Now then, I would really prefer that you escorted me, Ayato,
but as Julis is the guest of honor...
I will have to live with it.
In return, please be sure to pay us some attention later.
Now, then...
Go on!
W-Well, I suppose I have no choice.
Here.
Go on.
This is what you do...
Bend your elbow a little.
That is it.
S-Sorry...
Do not worry about it.
If push comes to shove, I will lead the way.
Everybody...
It is time to go.
Are you all ready?
You look pretty exhausted.
Well, sure I am.
I never thought there would be this many people.
I hate to say this... but I thought your family had no money?
This country may have money to spend on me,
but I have none to use myself.
Besides, my brother is not like me.
Not like you?
My brother never speaks out politically,
and he has no enthusiasm for his job.
You could say that he is the ideal puppet.
That is why the Integrated Enterprise Foundation treasures him,
and why they ignore it when he wants to have his way.
By the way, those women are my brother's lovers.
Lovers...
Is he really being that bold about it?
They, like Maria, were sent here by the Integrated Enterprise Foundation.
I would not go so far as to call them spies, but...
Maria, too?
Well, my sister-in-law is a genuine airhead,
so in her case, ignorance is probably bliss.
And it is not like I dislike my sister-in-law.
As for Claudia,
her father is in charge of this region of the galaxy.
She is visited Lieseltania with her father numerous times since childhood,
which is why she is friendly with my brother.
Is Claudia's dad also an Integrated Enterprise Foundation executive?
No, he is more like her mother's personal subordinate.
He probably has no chance of becoming an executive.
Why is that?
Because he is too human.
The only way to become an executive
at the Integrated Enterprise Foundation is to lose your humanity.
That is why, for me personally,
her father had a more favorable impression on me than her mother.
At the very least, I could tell that he cared for his daughter deeply.
Julis!
Damn my brother.
I do not want to get into another conversation like yesterday, so you...
Right.
I am going to go get some air over there.
That dress looks divine on you!
Uh, right.
Uh, right.
You fought so magnificently in the Phoenix Festa.
Th-Thank you very
You do not have your sword on you today?
N-No, um...
Kirin, do you have a second?
Yes!
I am sorry!
Please excuse me!
Thank you very much, Ayato-senpai.
You saved me.
It is so hard for me to talk to people I do not know.
And besides...
I am not pretty like the senpais.
I do not think that is true.
B-But...
A dress like this...
It just does not fit a child like me.
Like I said before, you look great in that dress.
Really grown-up and beautiful.
Right!
Th-Thank you... very much.
R-Right!
See you later!
YOU-Um...
I have a favor to ask of you.
Do you mind?
A favor?
YOU-Um... I would like to link arms with you, too, Ayato-senpai.
Wh-When you did it with Julis-senpai earlier, it looked so lovely...
I guess I do not mind.
But I do not know if I can be a proper escort.
Th-That is fine!
If you could just do that for me, I would be so...
In that case,
here.
Uh, Kirin?
I do not think we should be this close together.
I-I am so sorry!
No fair, having him all to yourself.
S-Saya!
What is up with that all of a sudden?
I want to link arms with you, too.
Now that is what you call a pretty girl on each arm!
I must say, I do like to see that kind of spirit!
Just what you would expect of someone who made his mark in the Phoenix Festa!
Right.
Thank you very much.
By the way, are you planning to take part in the next Gryps Festa, as well?
Rumor has it that you will be joining Ms. Enfield's team.
Well, I have not quite decided yet.
Is that right?
In that case...
I believe it would be in your best interests not to join her team.
What do you mean by that?
What?
Just what I said.
It would not bode well for a certain someone,
should you join Ms. Enfield's team.
My job is to find a way to somehow stop you.
And so I have come to make that request.
And if I refuse?
That would be extremely unfortunate.
Having to dispatch an innocent youth would pain my heart.
And so... that job shall go to this child.
Now then, please excuse me.
Come back here!
Kirin!
38-type Lux grenade launcher...
Hernekraume.
Burst.
Did not I tell you?
That I would come to your aid, Ayato.
Saya...
What is going on here?
Kirin, you stay here.
A-All right!
Ayato!
Ayato-senpai!
Amagiri Shinmei Style Grappling Skill...
Coffin Feather Drill!
Amagiri Shinmei Style...
Unbreakable Thunder!
Saya!
Julis!
- Leave it to us!
- Roger that.
Burst into bloom...
Hernekraume!
- Amaryllis! - Kaboom.
Who knew?
So even a chimera is no match for him?
To be able to do all that without a weapon...
he is going to be a handful.
I would have preferred not to get too involved on this level, but...
What do you think of my dance moves, polished by high society?
No need to be so nervous, Ayato.
Episode 23 The Lonely Strega
I am going to teach you all you need to know... from A to Z!
